articles.description: Four attackers were responsible for stealing at least 95% of the money. Two have already said they will return the money they had stolen, according to co-founder Sunny Aggarwal.
articles.title: Osmosis Exploited For $5M Due To Contract Bug

articles.title: Market Maker Mishap Leads to Loss of 20M OP Tokens

articles.description: On June 8, the public Ropsten testnet transitioned from Proof-of-Work consensus to Proof-of-Stake.
articles.title: Ethereum’s Ropsten Testnet Merge Is Complete
